bibl.title: Ptolemaic and Hellenistic Institutions in Literary Sources.
bibl.note: The classical authors often fail to provide specific information. Discusses the problem of the "philoi tou basileos".

bibl.title: Egitto e storia antica. Atti del Colloquio internazionale. Bologna, 31.8-2.9.1987

bibl.seg: Mooren Leon, Ptolemaic and Hellenistic Institutions in Literary Sources.
Egitto e storia antica. Atti del Colloquio internazionale. Bologna, 31.8-2.9.1987 (Bologna, 1989) pp. 573-581.
The classical authors often fail to provide specific information. Discusses the problem of the "philoi tou basileos".
